title: Kilian Sander’s Personal Website
text:
This website is currently under construction.
Kilian Sander is a research fellow and PhD student at Hanover Music Lab.
He is also an editorial assistant at the Jahrbuch Musikpsychologie.
You can find him on Google Scholar and with his ORCiD or follow him on Research Gate.
This page was last updated on 2024-03-30 15:34:28 CET.
